Card1: Flexible and Customizable: Ideal for small, quick tasks or consultations.
Immediate Start: Quick response and service initiation.
Pay As You Go: Charged based on actual hours worked.
Card2: Full-Day Engagement: Best for intensive work requiring more than a few hours.
Comprehensive Coverage: Suitable for longer tasks needing sustained focus.
Ideal for Workshops: Perfect for training sessions or in-depth analysis.
Card3: End-to-End Solution: Tailored for complete project delivery from start to finish.
Fixed Project Price: Total cost determined upfront based on project scope.
Holistic Approach: Inclusive of all aspects of the project, ensuring thorough execution.
